general.name: Office C2R Update Status Monitor
general.description: Checks the installed C2R version of Office and alerts if it is out of date. Windows 8.1/Server 2012 R2 and older are not supported due to limitations imposed by Microsoft.

variable.name: MaxAge
variable.description: Days before the latest release is considered "current".

variable.name: AlertOnOS
variable.description: Alert if the Operating System is unsupported.

variable.name: AlertOnNonC2R
variable.description: Alert if system is running a non-C2R edition of Office.

variable.name: AlertOnChannel
variable.description: Alert if system is running a channel not supported by the monitor.

variable.name: AlertOnDisabled
variable.description: Alert if Office automatic updates are disabled by policy
